price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߢߊ ߟߴߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߸ ߌ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍߣߊ߫ ߡߝߊ߬ߟߋ߲߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߠߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߢߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
